edu.ucla.sspace.mains

Class FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexingMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.mains.FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexingMain

  • public class FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexingMain
extends Object
    The executable class for running FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexing from the command-line.
    Author:
    David Jurgens
    See Also:
    TemporalRandomIndexing, RandomIndexing

      • parseDocumentsMultiThreaded

        protected void parseDocumentsMultiThreaded(FixedDurationTemporalRandomIndexing fdTri,
                               Iterator<TemporalDocument> docIter,
                               TimeSpan timeSpan,
                               int numThreads)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           InterruptedException
        Calls processDocument once for every document in docIter using a the specified number thread to call processSpace on the TemporalSemanticSpace instance.
        Parameters:
        sspace - the space to build
        docIter - an iterator over all the documents to process
        numThreads - the number of threads to use
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
